title: Compare Colbert to Smith on national wealth

content.question:
Directions: The suggested writing and planning time for the question below is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer. In writing your essay, use specific examples to support your answer. 

Both Jean-Baptiste Colbert (1619-1683) and Adam Smith (1723-1790) sought to increase the wealth of their respective countries. How did their recommendations differ?
